      • getCellIsRocky

        public boolean getCellIsRocky(Position pos)
        Returns whether the cell at a given position is Rocky. Ants cannot traverse rocky cells
        Parameters:
        pos - the position of the cell
        Returns:
        true if the cell is rocky, false otherwise.

      • getCellContents

        public Content getCellContents(Position pos)
        Gets the contents of a cell at a given position.
        Parameters:
        pos - the position of the cell
        Returns:
        char representing the contents of the cell

      • getCellScentMarker

        public int getCellScentMarker(Colour colourOfQueryingAnt,
                              Position pos)
        Gets the scent marker of a cell at a given position. If the scent marker is
        Parameters:
        colourOfQueryingAnt - the colour of the colony the querying ant belongs to
        pos - the position of the cell
        Returns:
        The scent marker at the given cell. (1-7) are black colony scents (7-13) are red. 0 if no scent marker has been placed.

        IF THE COLOUR OF THE QUERYING ANT IS ENEMY TO THE SCENT MARKER STORED IN THE CELL, THEN THIS METHOD WILL RETURN -1

      • getAntAtCell

        public Ant getAntAtCell(Position pos)
        Gets the ant at the cell with given position. Returns 0 if cell contains no ant.
        Parameters:
        pos - the position of the cell
        Returns:
        id of ant at given position

      • getAdjacentEnemyAnts

        public int getAdjacentEnemyAnts(Position pos,
                                Colour colour)
        #
        Parameters:
        pos - the position of the ant
        colour - the colour of the target at at position pos, which is being checked for adjacent ants.
        Returns:
        number representing adjacent enemy ants

                  throws CellAlreadyOccupiedException

        Parameters:

        ant - the object of the ant
        Throws:

      • setCellScentMarker

        public void setCellScentMarker(Position pos,
                               int marker)
        Sets the scent marker of a cell
        Parameters:
        pos - the position of the cell
        marker - the value representing the scent mark. int between 1 (inclusive) and 13 (exclusive). Use 0 to remove the scent
